about_the_game:
As the numbers of combat ready soldiers in the ranks of the remaining army continue to dwindle, High command devised a plan to use convicts as manpower via mind control.

Now your task is to hunt mutants around the sector using this experimental technology.

This game features:

-Top down view

-Gruesome and unforgiving combat 

-Explore Post apocalyptic maps the way you choose

-Progression system including quests to earn items and weapons to aid in your hunt

-Stylized retro inspired graphics

-A world of lore to explore to discover

As you go deeper into the world, you'll discover hidden secrets and solve the mystery of what is actually hiding in the metropolis. Each trip leads you closer to the truth, unveiling the truth behind the origin of mutations.

Prepare to face the unknown, sharpen your hunting skills, and become the beacon of hope for the United States remnants. The fate of the sector lies in your hands. Are you ready to take on the challenge?
